General.Name: ReVolve Renewable Power Corp.
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: ReVolve Renewable Power Corp. engages in the development of renewable energy electricity generation projects in the United States and Mexico. Its portfolio includes 3GW of wind, solar, and battery storage projects. ReVolve Renewable Power Corp. is headquartered in Fairview, Ireland.
